title: Gesture Phase Segmentation
summary: The dataset is composed by features extracted from 7 videos with people gesticulating, aiming at studying Gesture Phase Segmentation. It contains 50 attributes divided into two files for each video.

id.name: Id
id.description: Unique identifier for each sample in the dataset.

target.name: Phase
target.description: Phase segment: D (rest position, from portuguese 'descanso'); P (preparation); S (stroke); H (hold); R (retraction)

features.name: X1
features.description: Vectorial velocity of left hand (x coordinate)

features.description: Vectorial velocity of left hand (y coordinate)

features.description: Vectorial velocity of left hand (z coordinate)
